name: vulners-lookup
description: Chrome extension for CVE detection and vulnerability lookup using Vulners.com

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run build:css && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run build:ts:prod && npm run build:css && npm run copy:assets && npm run package
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp assets/* dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.package: mkdir -p build && cp manifest.json popup.html build/ && cp -r dist build/ && cp -r assets build/
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
